newsitem.title: USA: Forte Computer says acquisitions progress.
newsitem.headline: Forte Computer says acquisitions progress.

text.p: Forte Computer Easy International Inc said Monday that negotiations to acquire Eagle Window & Door Inc, Taylor Building Products Co and Mallyclad Corp are advancing toward the stage of reaching a definitive agreement.
The company said it hopes to be ready to sign a definitive agreement with American Architectural Products Inc, which owns the three firms, in mid-October.
If the deal is completed, Forte Computer Easy said it intends to change its name to American Architectural Products Inc.
Eagle Window & Door is based in Dubuque, Iowa; Taylor Building Products is based in West Branch, Mich.; and Mallyclad is based in Detroit.
